post:
Front Range Hosting offers powerful, fast SSD Accelerated OpenVZ & KVM VPS Solutions.

Now Part of WireSix.com(Total Server Solutions) (Rebranding in progress) which gives us access to 6 data centers spanning the United States

Our nodes feature SSD Arrays in RAID-10 Configuration, Gigabit Uplinks, and multiple 10G uplinks to multiple diverse carriers per datacenter.

Current Locations are Atlanta, GA and Los Angeles, CA.  Chicago soon.  All Colo@ Facilities.


It’s Black Friday/Cyber Monday Weekend our specials are below!


All KVM plans 25% off with code KVM25

All OpenVZ Plans 25% off with code OVZ25 (Excludes VPS-128 has it’s own special!)

OpenVZ VPS-128 Described below is 12.00/yr (Bug with order form showing full amount but invoices will be correct)  Use code VPS128YR12

Locations: Los Angeles, California and Atlanta Georgia, USA!  Inside Colo@ Facilities also part of Total Server Solutions.

Our VPS Servers Feature:

  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • 24/7 Support
  • OpenVZ Virtualization
  • Native IPv6 Support
  • Gigabit Ports
  • Free DNS Management, RDNS Support IPv4 & IPv6
  • RAID-10 SSD Enterprise Drive Systems
  • Full Root Access
  • Tun/Tap/ppp device user controllable
  • 99.9% Network Uptime
  • Supermicro Hardware
  • Intel Xeon E5 Series Powered
  • Unlimited OS Reloads
  • Excellent Customer/Node Ratio
  • EV SSL Protected Shopping Cart
